entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Hudson Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hudson Bay 9:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Temperature: -28.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -34
Dewpoint: -31.3°C
Wind: SW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill near minus 37. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
